com.qtfx.library.gui

Class Option

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtfx.library.gui.Option

  • public class Option
extends java.lang.Object
    An option packs the necessary attributes to define a button. Buttons are ordered by the order key within groups that in turn are ordered by the group key.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
